data.question: $$\begin{equation}\begin{split}(a - b)^2 &= (a - b)(a - b) \&= a(a - b) - b(a - b)\&= a^2 -ab -ba + b^2\&= a^2 + 2ab + b^2   \nonumber\end{split}\end{equation}$$
Find $$\{ x, y, z \} \in \N$$ where:$$x^2 + y^2 = z^2$$
data.solution:
Let a – b = x, b – c = 2x and c – d = 3x
∴ c = 3x + d
b = 2x + c = 5x + d
a = x + b = 6x + d
∴ $\frac {a+d}{c} = \frac {6x+d+d}{3x+d} = \frac 21$

data.question: \text{ If } \frac ab = \frac 23,\frac bc = \frac 35 \text{ and } \frac cd = \frac 56 \text{ then what is the value of } \frac{3a+2b+4c+d}{3d+4c} ?
data.solution:
$\frac a2 = \frac b3,\frac b3 = \frac c5,\frac c5 = \frac d6$
∴ $\frac a2 = \frac b3 = \frac c5 = \frac d6$ = k (say)
∴ $\frac{3a+2b+4c+d}{3d+4c} = \frac{3(2k)+2(3k)+4(5k)+6k}{3(6k)+4(5k)} = \frac{38}{38} = 1 $
